stem: Given question: She was a human in America who wanted to live well, what was a given for her situation? and answer: need money, explain why in
no_more_50_words: One needs money to be able to live well in America.
more_than_250:
It is a given that anyone who wants to live well in America needs money. Money is a necessary tool for purchasing basic necessities such as food, shelter, and clothing, as well as luxuries such as vacations and entertainment. Without money, individuals are unable to purchase the items and services they need to live a comfortable life.

Money is also necessary for accessing healthcare and education. Most medical services and educational institutions require payment for their services, and without money, individuals are unable to access these essential resources. Money is also important for providing security and stability. It can be used to purchase insurance, save for retirement and emergencies, and even invest in businesses and stocks. Having money gives individuals the financial freedom to make decisions about their future without worrying about a lack of resources.

Additionally, money is the currency of power and influence. Having a large sum of money allows individuals to wield influence within their communities and beyond. Money gives people the ability to donate to causes they believe in, purchase political influence, and even fund campaigns. Money also gives individuals the capability to access resources that are otherwise not available to them, such as exclusive clubs, private schools, and other exclusive services.

In short, money is a necessary component for anyone who wants to live well in America. Money provides security, stability, and access to essential resources, and it also gives individuals the power to influence the world around them. Without money, individuals are unable to enjoy the same level of comfort and security that money provides.
